summary: This document is a Bureau of Prisons count sheet and inmate roster from the Metropolitan Correctional Center in New York, dated August 9-10, 2019. It records inmate counts by housing unit and includes a roster showing Jeffrey Epstein was on suicide watch in the Special Housing Unit (SHU) at the time, just prior to his death.

persons.name: Jeffrey Epstein
persons.context: Listed on the inmate roster with the registration number 76318-054, assigned to the Special Housing Unit (SHU) under suicide watch status.

events.title: Epstein on Suicide Watch
events.description: Jeffrey Epstein is listed on the inmate roster as being under suicide watch in the Special Housing Unit (SHU) at the Metropolitan Correctional Center, New York.

locations: Metropolitan Correctional Center, New York, NY
keyFacts: This document is dated August 9-10, 2019, the period immediately preceding Jeffrey Epstein's death on August 10, 2019.
Jeffrey Epstein is listed with inmate registration number 76318-054.
The inmate roster shows Epstein was assigned to the Special Housing Unit (SHU) under suicide watch status.
The document is an official Bureau of Prisons count sheet, recording inmate population by housing unit for the facility.
The total inmate count recorded was 758 individuals.
